overview_of_class: Methods are described for modelling binary responses with multiple explanatory variables. Potential topics include: statistical decision theory, logistic regression models, neural networks, and decision trees, performance measures of data mining.
name: Topics in Statistics
title: WCAS STAT 359-0-1 Topics in Statistics

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Methods are described for modelling binary responses with multiple explanatory variables. Potential topics include: statistical decision theory, logistic regression models, neural networks, and decision trees, performance measures of data mining.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Courses in probability and statistics comparable to Statistics 320-1,2; and a course in multiple regression comparable to Statistics 350.

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value: Some basic concepts and methodology of statistical data mining.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: homework and presentation of a related topic.
